title: MULLED WINE
directions: Combine all ingredients in a non-aluminum saucepan, and bring to a simmer (not a boil — you don’t want to boil the alcohol out!) over medium-high heat. Reduce heat to medium-low, and let the wine simmer for at least 15 minutes or up to 3 hours. Strain, and serve warm with your desired garnishes.
ingredients: 1 (750 ml) bottle of dry red wine
optional garnishes: citrus slices (orange, lemon and/or lime), extra cinnamon sticks, extra star anise
